name: Fragment 1
description:
Fragment 1 is a short experiment in virtual reality playing with the concept of change blindness. It's a seated experience.

Relax and take your time, it's not a game but a simple experience which won't take more than a minute or two to complete, with just a few interactions.

It's the first of, I hope, multiple fragments exploring simple and short concepts in virtual reality.

My goal is to be able to release game-jam-like (maximum 2-3 days of development) short experiments in the following weeks. This first one took around 10-15 hours to make.
